newsitem.title: UGANDA: Uganda's 1995 cow hides exports earn $8.89 mln.
newsitem.headline: Uganda's 1995 cow hides exports earn $8.89 mln.

text.p: Uganda exported 4,343 tonnes of cattle hides in 1995, down from 7,479 tonnes in the previous year, the finance ministry said on Friday.
Hard currency earnings too fell to $8.89 million in 1995, down from $12.5 million in 1994, the ministry said in a report.
The report did not give reasons for the fall or a forecast for 1996. Uganda exports most of its cattle hides to eastern European countries but also to its neighbours.
The East African country, trying to reduce reliance on just one export crop, coffee, exported 5,259 tonnes of cattle hides in 1993 that brought in $5.22 million, official records showed.
